text: Mɨtaghniar kam mɨghsɨam azofa, mɨghsɨar kam Bethoronɨn nguibar ekiamɨn boroghɨn iti. Egha aruem ghuaghiri naghɨn ghua, egha ragha sautɨn amadaghan zui. Egha sautɨn amadaghan ghuaghira Kiriat Balɨn nguibamɨn oto, an ziar mam, Kiriat Jearim. Kar Judabar nguibar ekiam. Benjaminɨn anabamɨn adarazir nguazir mɨtaghniam, kagh ikegha aruem uaghiri naghɨn iraghu.
